description: Devices and gadgets including audio, video, and computing products.
Shoes, sandals, and other types of footwear.
Appliances, utensils, and accessories for kitchen and dining.
Products for fitness, exercise, and outdoor activities.
Health and personal care products, including grooming and wellness items.
Products for office and study, including furniture, stationery, and equipment.
Tools for home improvement and DIY projects, including power tools and accessories.
